description: An anthology of short stories featuring the resourcefulness of ordinary Soviet citizens in fighting back against Nazi cruelty during the invasion of 1941 on, features an episode of a peasant woman who poisons food she cooks for the occupiers.

Title: 517. Jesse James at Bay
description: Jesse James joins with Missouri settlers in their battle with rich, land-grabbing railroad tycoons.

Title: 518. Fugitive Valley
description: The Range Busters have a plan to get into the outlaw's hideout in Fugitive Valley. The Sheriff puts Crash and Langdon in jail together and then has Dusty break them out. Langdon then leads them to Fugitive Valley where they hope to round up the gang.

Title: 519. South of Panama
description: Reporter Mike Lawrence lands in Panama, gets embraced by a stranger, and is pursued by agents convinced he has a secret formula for the Panama Canal's safety.

Title: 520. Where Did You Get That Girl?
description: Through a mix-up, the members of a band get thrown in jail as robbery suspects.

Title: 521. Burma Convoy
description: A truck convoy traveling the Burma Road is menaced by a group of smugglers.

Title: 522. The Kid from Kansas
description: Competition among fruit growers takes a nasty turn when the main buyer offers unrealistically low prices for their crops.

Title: 523. Saddle Mountain Roundup
description: An old man and his Chinese servant are in danger of becoming victims of the ruthless killer, "The Raven."

Title: 525. Den forsvundne pølsemaker
description: The detectives Gløgg and Rask is put on the task of finding out what has happened to the lost sausage maker H. Brand. They find him after a lot of trouble.

Title: 526. Aryamala
description: The love story of Kathavarayan and Aryamala.

Title: 527. Bahama Passage
description: A girl, Carol Delbridge (Madeleine Carroll), whom the audience is quickly informed has been around, and her father arrive to take over the business management of an island in the Bahamas owned by Adrian Ainsworth (Sterling Hayden), descendant of many ancestors who have handled it over the years to the satisfaction of its two hundred and fifty native residents. He is married to a woman who stays away from the island because she is lonely when she's there. Adrian doesn't want Carol or her father there, and they don't want to be either. Romance can't be lurking far behind the beautiful sunset.

Title: 528. The Saint Meets the Tiger
description: The last words uttered by by a conscience-stricken crook dying on the Saint's doorstep lead the detective in pursuit of gold smugglers and the master crook known as the Tiger.

Title: 529. Hit the Road
description: Kids look to get revenge when their fathers are all killed in a mob war.

Title: 530. Knockout
description: A prize fighter falls under the nefarious influence of an unscrupulous boxing promoter-manager, to the detriment of his marriage.

Title: 531. Yo quiero ser bataclana
description: Catita intercedes when a producer pretends to the chorus of a theater of magazines that is the director's girlfriend.

Title: 532. Ridin' on a Rainbow
description: Gene's investigation of a bank robbery takes him to a showboat, where he finds that teenage singer Patsy's father has been working with the robbers to provide for her future.

Title: 533. Cyclone on Horseback
description: Delivering horses, Stan Bradford gets caught up in Cobb Wayne's attempt to stop Jeff Corbin from completing the telephone line. If Corbin fails to meet the deadline, Wayne can take over. Bradford wants to return to his ranch, but when Wayne's man shoots Corbin, he takes over the job.

Title: 534. Marco Visconti
description: Medieval romance: Visconti, head of Milan's militia loves a noblewoman whose mother he'd courted 20 years ago, only to lose her in an arranged marriage.This time the competition is his cousin.The drama builds to a jousting tournament.

Title: 536. A Dangerous Game
description: Detectives Dick Williams and Andy McAllister find themselves trying to solve several crimes at an isolated mentally-ill hospital, where the patients range from slightly daffy to criminally insane, and they don't know which is which. A gang is out to steal a fortune inherited by one of the patients and, before Dick and Andy solve the case, several patients are transferred to the cemetery. And 'tiddlie-winks" are indeed involved.

Title: 537. The Royal Mounted Patrol
description: "Lucky" Lawrence, an airplane pilot, and Tom Jeffries, a cowpuncher, becomes friends while training for The Royal Canadian Mounted Police. "Lucky" is assigned to the Air Patrol branch, while Tom is sent to open a new post in a remote forest region. There, he finds "Frenchy" Duvalle, a lumber camp boss, flagrantly violating the Canadian forest laws. Their run-in is interrupted by an epidemic outbreak. "Lucky" flies in with the life-saving vaccines. Later, Frenchy's sister, Betty , unaware of her brother's unlawful activities, comes to the post as a school teacher. "Frency," trying to illegally float logs down the river, imperiling the wharves, sets fire to the grasslands near his camp, when Tom tries to stop the log drive. The fire spreads, endangering an Indian family, and "Lucky" flies in to rescue them. Tom goes after "Frenchy", who has already killed one Mountie, and "Frenchy" holds his sister as an hostage.

Title: 538. U-Boote westwärts!
description: This Nazi propaganda film follows the exploits of a German submarine as it prowls the North Atlantic.

Title: 540. Forbidden Trails
description: When two outlaws are released from prison, they travel to Arizona to "take care of" the newly retired Marshal that put them behind bars.

Title: 541. Wrangler's Roost
description: The notorious outlaw Black Bart has reappeared and the Range Busters are sent to investigate. When they find that Black Bart is now a respectable citizen and that someone is impersonating him, they set a trap for the robber.

Title: 542. Pirates on Horseback
description: Hoppy, Lucky and California search for a mine owned by Trudy Pendleton after it was taken from her by the swindling gambler Ace Gibson. They find the mine and Hoppy fights Gibson over it.

Title: 543. Fröken Vildkatt
description: Thomas Palm has recently been promoted at his work at The Royal Canal Office. He celebrates with his friends on a night out and on the way home he saves a woman from drowning.

Title: 545. Secret Evidence
description: PRC - Marjorie Reynolds, Charles Quigley, Ward McTaggart, Kenneth Harlan, Donald Curtis. When Reynolds becomes engaged to the local DA, played by Quigley, her former boyfriend gangster shows up. The gangster later ends up shot! However, whos to blame? The finger would seem to point at Marjorie. Nifty PRC crime. 16mm

Title: 546. Her First Beau
description: 15-year-old Penelope (Penny) Wood has two great interests - Chuck Harris and the hope that some day she might become a famous,great writer. Chuck also has two interests - his home-made glider and the hope that some day he will go to Tech college. His indifference to Penny is her chief source of annoyance. Mervyn Roberts, Penny's uncle who is only five years older than she is, arrives home with a guest, Roger Van Vleck, and Penny falls for Roger's sophistication. Chuck, resentful, continues to work on his glider over his father's objections. His father wants it destroyed but Elmer Tuttle, their hired man, hides it.

Title: 548. Reaching for the Sun
description: A backwoodsman comes to Detroit to get a job and earn money to buy an outboard motor.

Title: 549. Kaivopuiston kaunis Regina
description: At the eve of Crimean war orphaned Regina lives with her grandmother in a small cabin near a lavish villa. As the summer approaches there is great anticipation of a big ball to be held.

Title: 550. Trail of the Silver Spurs
description: The Range Busters are investigating a gold robbery from the Denver Mint in a supposedly deserted Arizona ghost town, but they soon find they're not the only town resident with a nose for gold.

Title: 551. Último refugio
description: Albareda does not doubt to betray her lover running away after denouncing him.

Title: 552. Auf Wiedersehn, Franziska!
description: Michael and Franziska's relationship suffers from the separations brought on by his photojournalism. Only after Michael's colleague lay dying in his arms does he decide to go home, but is asked by Franziska to join the war: as a soldier.

Title: 554. En forbryder
description: Erik Hansen (Pouel Kerrn) is heavily indebted three years after he financed his wedding through shady loans from a loan shark. To solve the situation, he is coerced to make decisions that end up digging his own hole only deeper and deeper.

Title: 556. In the Rear of the Enemy
description: During the Winter War three Soviet soldiers perform a risky recon mission.

Title: 557. Mr. District Attorney in the Carter Case
description: Assistant District Attorney P. Cadwallader Jones (James Ellison) and his sweetheart Terry Parker (Virginia Gilmore), a newspaper reporter, are about to be married when news comes that newspaper publisher Elliott Carter (Bradley Page) has been murdered. The marriage is postponed, and Jones is assigned to the case by his superior, District Attorney Winton (Paul Harvey) and obtains a conviction in court against Andrew Belmont (John Eldredge). Terry, however, discovers further evidence and Jones agrees to re-open the case.

Title: 558. Mamma
description: Matilde Sarni lives in her villa near Rome. She has a son who has just married Donata and who is coming home after a series of recitals in the States. Mario, her son, is a famous opera singer and he is twenty years older than his wife. Besides Donata doesn't like country life. So when Mario leaves for a tour of recitals and Donata meets Giulio...

Title: 559. Clarissa
description: Clarissa is promoted to department head of Feerenbach's bank. He and bank clerk Lutz both love her. When she falls for Lutz she soon is led to believe that he only uses her to cover up his own illegal speculations with the bank's funds.

Title: 560. Lucky Devils
description: A triad of rival news journalist go to great lengths in sabotaging each other, but come together as heroes when they're unwittingly embroiled in a sinister foreign intelligence plot to blow up a dam.

Title: 561. Man at Large
description: Reporter Dallas Dayle and FBI agent Bob Grayson hunt an escaped German agent.

Title: 562. Annelie
description: A Berlin woman grows up in the wake of Prussia's victory over France in 1870 and lives to see her grandchildren participating in the military successes of Germany under Hitler.

Title: 563. Tanker 'Derbent'
description: The most backward tanker among the ships of the Caspian Sea is becoming an advanced and exemplary one.

Title: 564. Jungle Cavalcade
description: "Frank Buck's Jungle Cavalcade" is a compilation film that consists of footage from three previous Frank Buck expedition films: "Bring 'em Back Alive," "Wild Cargo" and "Fang and Claw." Unlike most compilation films from major studios (and there aren't a whole lot of them to start with), RKO made no attempt to keep the viewing audience from being aware of that they were watching nearly 100% archive footage. They sniped every ad and poster with "From - "BRING 'EM BACK ALIVE" - "WILD CARGO" and "FANG AND CLAW", in addition to crediting Clyde Elliott as the director of the "Bring 'em Back Alive" sequences and Armand Denis as the director of the "Wild Cargo" sequences...on all of the advertising and the film. They also used such tag lines as "3 in 1 THRILLER. Streamlining the Mightiest Scenes from ALL His Greatest Pictures..."

Title: 565. Mercy Island
description: Warren Ramsey (Ray Middleton) is an ambitious young lawyer whose ultimate failure might be traced to his ruthlessness, insanity, or a blow on the head. Marooned on an island with his wife Leslie (Gloria Dickson), his friend Clay Foster (Donald Douglas), and the seaman Captain Love (Forrester Harvey) and the Guide (Bill Shirley) who had led them there. He finds an old man, Doctor Sanderson (Otto Kruger), who had fled there after a pitiful accident, who is unjustly under suspicion of murder. Ramsey's mental state causes him to imagine that Leslie and Clay Foster are having an affair and he has a plan to put an end to that. His decision, for his personal prestige, to bring the innocent Dr. Sanderson back to face trial is contested by the whole party, and finally prevented by fate, design,accident or possibly an angry alligator.

Title: 567. ¡Harka!
description: In Morocco, 'Harka' was the name for the military expedition of native troops or irregular organization of Moroccan rebels revolted against Spanish dominion in the area. Captain Santiago Balcázar is distinguished as one of the most seasoned Spanish officers in the fight against insurgents. Lieutenant Carlos Herrera will emulate him, but he should be struggle between military duty and his love for his fiancé Amparo before that.

Title: 568. Bachelor Daddy
description: The lives of three bachelors is disrupted when one of them is left with a baby.

Title: 569. Premier bal
description: Two country sisters are rivals for the love of the doctor. He marries one, but regrets it and is rescued by the other.

Title: 570. Frauen sind doch bessere Diplomaten
description: A seductive dancer (Marika Rökk) helps her uncle to fight against the closing of his casino. Through her feminine charm she achieves diplomatic success.

Title: 571. The Masked Rider
description: The beautiful owner of a silver mine in Mexico asks an employee for help when bandits keep robbing her shipments.'

Title: 572. Landstormens lilla argbigga
description: Spoiled upper class girl Marianne reluctantly join a home defense unit to learn military drill. The unit, led by lieutenant Victor, is a stern officer but has in fact a crush on her. Victor has developed an engine that foreign agents are trying to get their hands on. Marianne hates the drill to begin with but soon develops warm feelings for Victor.

Title: 573. Un bebé de París
description: A woman fakes her pregnancy to keep her husband and then it turns out to be true.

Title: 574. The Devil Pays Off
description: Chris Waring (William Wright) is a government investigator trying to gather the necessary evidence to convict a shipping magnate, DeBrock (J.Edward Bromberg), of selling his ships to the United States but is suspected of holding up and preventing their delivery because of bribes from foreign powers. DeBrock's conscience, nor his flirty wife, Valerie DeBrock (Osa Massen), give him any peace of mind.

Title: 575. Ride, Kelly, Ride
description: Jockey (Stephens) struggles against gamblers with the help of stable trainer (Pallette) and horse onwer's daughter (Quigley).

Title: 576. Marry the Boss's Daughter
description: A young man from Kansas goes to New York to work for his tycoon-hero. His superiors won't listen to his ideas about business, but the boss and his daughter do.

Title: 577. New Wine
description: The romantic story of Franz Schubert 's fight for recognition of his music. Fleeing Austria, he arouses passion strongly akin to mother love in a beautiful bucolic girl, who loves him to much to sacrifice genius on the altar of marriage.

Title: 578. Morskoy yastreb
description: A German submarine disguised as a merchant sailboat attacks foreign merchant ships and drowns them. The Soviet merchant ship, turned into a warship, sets off for the interception of a "pirate".

Title: 580. Lone Star Law Men
description: Outlaws are running wild in a border town. A marshal is sent in to clean it up.

Title: 581. Father's Son
description: The father disciplines his rambunctious son despite the mother's objections. The boy runs away and meets a stranger who takes him home. The parents argue and split up, but get back together when the son stages his own abduction.

Title: 582. Egy tál lencse
description: Margit takes a job on a rabbit farm in her friend's name and with her papers. She soon earns the trust of the owner the wealthy Mr. Kuglits and falls in love with his fired secretary, Sándor. They later find out out that Kuglits, wants to bequeath his huge fortune to her as his supposed niece.

Title: 583. Turned Out Nice Again
description: George, an employee at an outdated underwear company, invests in a revolutionary thread. The firm rejects it, so he quits. Later, they realize its potential and scramble to rehire him before competitors do, offering a lucrative deal.

Title: 584. Sins of Youth
description: An aging man in search of his lost sons.

Title: 585. Embrujo
description: The romance between Pedro I de Brasil, after the independence of the country, with Domitila de Castro, marquesa de Santos.

Title: 586. Hansen og Hansen
description: The young unknown Hansen stays at a pension, where they await a charmer with the same name. A fire and different circumstances make the police arrest the wrong man.

Title: 587. Ryhmy ja Romppainen
description: Ryhmy and Romppainen run into an international criminal gang that has stolen documents while on holiday from the war.

Title: 588. Desert Bandit
description: Hatfield has his henchman Largo and gang smuggling guns across the border. When guns are smuggled past Ranger Martin, Martin is jailed. The Sheriff, a crony of Hatfield, lets Martin out, shoots him, and blames the escape attempt on Bob Crandall. Kicked out of the Rangers, Crandall joins Largo's gang.

Title: 589. You're Out of Luck
description: An elevator operator and a janitor team up to solve two murders that may be connected to an illegal gambling operation.

Title: 590. Doctors Don't Tell
description: A naive young doctor, in a misguided effort to impress a young woman, finds himself in over his head when a gangster client demands plastic surgery to achieve the perfect disguise.

Title: 591. Here Comes Happiness
description: A rich girl loves a sandblaster instead of the socialite her mother wants her to marry.

Title: 592. Scattergood Baines
description: Young Scattergood Baines arrives in the small New England town of Coldriver. Through some shrewd business maneuvering, he manages to open up a hardware store. Twenty years later he has become a prosperous and respected member of the community, a member of the local school board and the owner of a railroad that transports timber to the local sawmill. Problems begin to arise, however, when a young schoolteacher he has hired turns out to be not quite what he expected, and the mill owners pressure Scattergood to sell them his railroad, with the idea of raising the transportation fees paid to them by the local loggers.

Title: 594. Adventure in Washington
description: The senator (Herbert Marshall) works to reform a delinquent youth who is working as a Senate page boy.

Title: 595. Passage from Hong Kong
description: Set in Hong Kong on the eve of the Japanese invasion and a version of "The Second Floor Mystery (1930)", Jeff Hunter (Douglas Kennedy), a writer of pulp thrillers, tries to woo a reluctant Maria Calhoun (Lucille Fairbanks) by inventing a murder story in which he claims he was implicated.

Title: 596. Bullets for O'Hara
description: A detective (Roger Pryor) courts a gangster's (Anthony Quinn) ex-wife (Joan Perry) to lure him into a trap.

Title: 598. Twilight on the Trail
description: Hoppy, Lucky and California are chasing cattle rustlers who have been bothering cattle rancher friends of Hoppy. A crooked foreman is the source of the trouble. Johnny and Lucy are the love focus.

Title: 599. La fuggitiva
description: In the absence of the biological mother, too busy pursuing her theatrical career, we see the glorification of the maternal surrogate, a woman who is a paragon of sacrifice and self-abnegation. La Fuggitiva is also a film in which a child actress takes a prominent role. In this sentimental drama, the little girl suffers for and rebels against the loneliness and neglect stemming from the lack of a mother and a loving family setting.

Title: 600. Sierra Sue
description: Gene is a government inspector looking into what's killing cattle. The ranchers want to burn the area to clear of a poisonous weed, but Gene favors chemical spray from an airplane.
